column4: Hi , anyone know which program which able to move file with GUI interface ? reason using command line mv works but doesn't show % of complete. Maybe a GUI Move file program able to show it ?
luftikuss : nautilus file manager doesn't have move option
: I mean in gui which show % of complete
when you move a file.....it shows you a progress bar if it's big enough to take longer than a nano second
: that one is Cut and paste file.Not move file.
1.) cut and paste IS move 2.) if you drag and drop with shift, it's move.
: drap and drop = copy , cut and paste is move ?
: why when I cut a folder to another partition my folder modified date get change while command line mv doesn't ?
no idea, how the file manager processes it ?
again if you drag while holding shift it will move
: ok , thanks , I guess cut and shift is the different.Thanks for telling :D
: nope , it doesn't reserve the modified time
